      • calculateNewPosition

        public static java.awt.geom.Point2D calculateNewPosition(com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Coordinate start,
                                                         double distance,
                                                         double direction)
        Calculates a new position based on a given starting point, a distance and a direction.
        Parameters:
        start - The start Coordinate for the calculation.
        distance - The distance in NM of the new position based on the start.
        direction - The direction in which the new position shall be located.
        Returns:
        The new position as a Point2D.
